# init()

**Initializer**

Creates a new, reusable JSON encoder with the default formatting settings and encoding strategies.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## First Steps

- **encode(_:)**: Returns a JSON-encoded representation of the value you supply.

items.description: Returns a JSON-encoded representation of the value you supply.
items.name: encode(_:)
